 Keeping sensitive data in separate files

You can append FILE to individual environment variables to provide their configuration in a separate file, enabling you to avoid passing sensitive details using environment variables. n8n loads the data from the file with the given name, making it possible to load data from Docker-Secrets and Kubernetes-Secrets. 

Refer to Environment variables for details on each variable.
